misalignments.reasoning: Admin dashboard page showing user statistics - not mentioned anywhere in specification which only lists pages: /, /login, /register, /dashboard
POST endpoint accepts and returns priority parameter for tasks, but Task model in specification (Section 5) does not include priority field
Includes priority dropdown selector (low/medium/high) not specified in Task Input Section requirements (Section 2.4)
Displays priority indicator with color coding, but specification only mentions checkbox, task title, and delete button for each task item (Section 2.4)
